title: Store cannot be accessed
body:
This is what happens when I try to go to the store: http://prnt.sc/eqliyv
It just stays blank.

I looked up some fixes and tried fiddling with internet explored as suggested, but to no avail. I just want to buy a champion, and this stuff starts happening... It hasn't happened before. I'm pretty frustrated, and any tips would be appreciated.

I honestly might have to uninstall and quit if this can't be fixed, which would be pretty depressing

replies.body: I'd hold off on uninstalling for now! We noticed that this store issue has been popping up for a number of players. Check our sticky post [**here **](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lKb27XVQ-problems-getting-the-store-to-load)to keep up to date as we find out more info!
Already uninstalled and reinstalled before seeing your respose (nothing changed, of course), but I'm glad it's not just me. Good to see it's being worked on, thanks for the help.
